long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Telegram File Downloader - download tg restricted content
 is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you effortlessly download audio, video, and image content from Telegram directly to your computer. Whether for personal or academic use, this tool provides a seamless way to save your favorite content. We advise users to refrain from downloading copyrighted material without permission.

💥 Key Features
One-Click Multi-Select Download: Easily select and download multiple files or a single resource with just one click, making the process quick and smooth.

Wide Format Support: Download a variety of media formats, including videos, images, photos, GIFs, music, and audiobooks, all in one convenient tool.

Save Content from Restricted Channels and Groups: Easily save audio and video files from restricted Telegram channels and groups directly to your local computer, ensuring you never miss out on your favorite content.

Extract Private Content: Safely save audio and video content from private channels and personal shares.

No Passwords or API Required: Simplified user experience with no need for additional information to start downloading.

24/7 Support: Enjoy round-the-clock technical support to resolve any issues you may encounter.

Effortless Download of 1GB+ Content: Handle large downloads with ease.

Full Compatibility: Our Telegram video downloader supports both A and K versions of channels and groups, allowing you to access your favorite content effortlessly.

Getting Started with Telegram Video Downloader
💥 Install the Chrome Extension
Install the Extension: Download and install the Telegram Video Downloader extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Pin the Extension:

Click on the "Extensions" button next to your profile icon in the browser.

Locate the newly installed plugin and click the "Pin" icon on the right to fix it to the toolbar for quick access.

💥 Access Telegram Web
Open Telegram Web: In your browser, go to Telegram Web: https://web.telegram.org/k or https://web.telegram.org/a.

💥 Download Content from Chat Dialogs
Browse Chat Dialogs: Navigate to the chat dialogs of the channel or group you wish to download content from.

Check Resources: The plugin icon in the toolbar will display the number of resources it has fetched.

Select and Download: Click the plugin icon in the toolbar to open the plugin window, select the desired content, and easily perform a batch download.

💥 Download Content from Group Info
Access Group Info: Go to the channel or group you are interested in and view the group information.

Download Media: Click the "Download All Media" or "Download Media for the Current Month" button to quickly retrieve all media files within the group.

💥 Download Individual Files
Select Individual Files: In the chat dialog of a channel or group, you will see a "Download" button below each music file, audiobook, video, or image.

Download: Click the "Download" button to download the individual file, making the process convenient and fast.

📝 Disclaimer
This plugin is independently developed and is not affiliated with the official Telegram app or website. Please ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations before use.


Telegram電報文件下載器 
是一款强大的Chrome扩展程序，旨在帮助您轻松地将Telegram中的音频、视频和图片内容直接下载到电脑上。无论是用于个人还是学术用途，这款工具都为您提供了一种无缝的方式来保存您喜爱的内容。我们建议用户在未经许可的情况下不要下载受版权保护的内容。

💥 主要功能
一键多选批量下载： 轻松选择并下载多个文件或单个资源，只需一键即可完成，使下载过程迅速而顺畅。

广泛的格式支持： 下载多种媒体格式，包括视频、图片、照片、GIF、音乐和有声读物，尽在一个便捷的工具中。

保存受限频道和群组的内容： 轻松将受限Telegram频道和群组中的音频和视频文件直接保存到本地计算机，确保您能够获取到所有喜爱内容。

提取私人内容： 安全保存来自私密频道和个人分享的音频及视频。

无需密码或API： 简化用户体验，无需输入额外信息，即可开始下载。

全天候支持： 提供24/7的技术支持，解决您的使用问题。

轻松下载1GB+内容： 处理大容量下载轻松自如。

全面兼容： 我们的Telegram视频下载器支持A版和K版的频道和群组，让您轻松获取您喜爱的内容。

开始使用Telegram视频下载器
💥 安装Chrome扩展程序
安装扩展程序： 从Chrome网上应用店下载并安装Telegram视频下载器扩展程序。

固定扩展程序：

点击浏览器右上角头像旁边的“扩展”按钮。

找到刚安装的插件，点击右侧的“Pin”图标，将其固定到工具栏，以便快速访问。

💥 访问Telegram网页版
打开Telegram网页版： 在浏览器中访问Telegram网页版：https://web.telegram.org/k 或 https://web.telegram.org/a。

💥 下载对话框内容
浏览对话框： 导航到您希望下载内容的频道或群组的对话框。

检查资源： 工具栏的插件图标将显示已抓取的资源数量。

选择并下载： 点击工具栏上的插件图标，打开插件窗口，选择所需的内容，轻松进行批量下载。

💥 下载群组信息内容
访问群组信息： 进入您感兴趣的频道或群组，查看群组信息。

下载媒体： 点击“下载全部媒体”或“下载当月媒体”按钮，快速获取群组内的所有媒体文件。

💥 下载单个文件
选择单个文件： 在频道或群组的对话框中，您将看到每个音乐文件、有声读物、视频或图片下方的“下载”按钮。

下载： 点击“下载”按钮，即可下载单个文件，方便快捷。

📝 免责声明：本插件独立开发，未与官方 Telegram 应用或网站关联，使用前请确保符合相关法律法规。
